channel.title: zip on Home
channel.description: Recent content in zip on Home

item.title: import zipfile
item.description: Recently, I had a look at zipfile module. It’s surprisingly easy to work with. Snippets below should give you a rough idea how to use it. Create a zip file import zipfile file_to_compress = "server.log" zip_file_name = "server.log.zip" with zipfile.ZipFile(zip_file_name, "w", zipfile.ZIP_DEFLATED) as myzip: myzip.write(file_to_compress) NOTE: 3rd argument defines the compression type. Choose from: ZIP_STORED (no compression) ZIP_DEFLATED (requires zlib) ZIP_BZIP2 (requires bz2) ZIP_LZMA (requires lzma) Unpack a zip archive with zipfile.
